about_the_game:
Get ready to stun on the red carpet with the Runway Pack, featuring the most elegant haute couture fashion aboard the ISS Alithea. Look hot in the cold with a high fashion winter coatsuit or raise the temperature with a stylish winter dress that rounds out this pack of 10 items.

INCLUDED CONTENT

  • Winter Dress (Winter Fashion Dress, Winter Feet)
  • Winter Coatsuit (Long Coat Jacket, Winter Boots)
  • Haute Couture Female 1 (Ray Gun Gothic Dress, Ray Gun Gothic Hat, Ray Gun Gothic Shoes)
  • Haute Couture Male 1 (Ray Gun Gothic Outfit, Ray Gun Gothic Hat, Ray Gun Gothic Shoes)
detailed_description:
Get ready to stun on the red carpet with the Runway Pack, featuring the most elegant haute couture fashion aboard the ISS Alithea. Look hot in the cold with a high fashion winter coatsuit or raise the temperature with a stylish winter dress that rounds out this pack of 10 items.

INCLUDED CONTENT

  • Winter Dress (Winter Fashion Dress, Winter Feet)
  • Winter Coatsuit (Long Coat Jacket, Winter Boots)
  • Haute Couture Female 1 (Ray Gun Gothic Dress, Ray Gun Gothic Hat, Ray Gun Gothic Shoes)
  • Haute Couture Male 1 (Ray Gun Gothic Outfit, Ray Gun Gothic Hat, Ray Gun Gothic Shoes)

package_groups.title: Buy First Class Trouble Runway Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone and headphones
